Relentless Assault.name: Relentless Assault
Relentless Assault.blurb: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.
Relentless Assault.description: Innate: Jax's basic attacks on-attack grant him  3.5% − 11% (based on level) bonus attack speed for 2.5 seconds, stacking up to 8 times for a maximum of  28% − 88% (based on level) bonus attack speed.
Relentless Assault.description2: Stacks are deducted one at a time every 0.25 seconds after not attacking for 2.5 seconds.

Leap Strike.name: Leap Strike
Leap Strike.blurb: Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.
Leap Strike.description: Active: Jax  dashes to the target unit or ward.
Leap Strike.description2: If his target is an enemy, he deals  physical damage to them.
Leap Strike.description3: Jax will attempt to automatically basic attack his target at the end of the dash.
Leap Strike.notes:
* Leap Strike will damage the target regardless of whether or not they remained where they were at the time of Jax's casting as well as regardless of whether or not Jax successfully dashed.
 Leap Strike can be used on any targetable allied or enemy unit (except structures)
 This includes champions, minions, wards, and champion pets ( Noxious Trap,  Demacian Standard,  Dark Passage).

  Spell shield will block the damage (including when  empowered) but will not prevent the dash.
 The auto attack following the ability will not grant any stack of  Conqueror,  Electrocute,  Phase Rush or  Spellthief's Edge.

Empower.name: Empower
Empower.blurb: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.
Empower.description: Active: Jax's next basic attack on non- structures or  Leap Strike within 10 seconds deals  bonus magic damage. If Empower is used on a basic attack, it will have  50 bonus range.
Empower.notes:
* Empower has no cast time and does not interrupt Jax's previous orders.
 Empower's bonus damage will cause  Muramana's to trigger twice with a single basic attack.
 The enhanced attack can be  dodged and will be consumed afterwards.
 Empower will be consumed if the attack  misses.

Counter Strike.name: Counter Strike
Counter Strike.blurb: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.
Counter Strike.description: Active: Jax enters Evasion, a defensive stance, for 2 seconds, causing all basic attacks against him to miss. Jax also takes 25% reduced damage from all champion area of effect abilities. Counter Strike can be recast after 1 second.
Counter Strike.description2: At the end of the duration, Jax  stuns all nearby enemies for 1 second and deals physical damage to them, increased by 20% for each attack dodged, up to a 100% increase.
Counter Strike.description3: Recast: Jax ends Counter Strike early.
Counter Strike.notes:
* Counter Strike has no cast time and does not interrupt Jax's previous orders.
 Counter Strike is not a channeled ability. 
 Jax will still dodge attacks and stun opponents when the duration ends even while being disabled by crowd control effects.

 Jax cannot dodge turret attacks.
 Counter Strike will also dodge abilities that can trigger on-hit effects ( Parrrley,  Mystic Shot) which will count towards Counter Strike's increased damage.

Grandmaster's Might.name: Grandmaster's Might
Grandmaster's Might.blurb: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.
Grandmaster's Might.description: Passive: Jax is granted one Grandmaster's Might stack for every basic attack on-hit within 2.5 seconds of each other, up to a maximum of two. At two stacks, Jax's next basic attack on-hit on  non-structures and  non-wards consumes the stacks to deal bonus magic damage.
Grandmaster's Might.description2: Active: Jax gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance for 8 seconds.
Grandmaster's Might.notes:
* The bonus magic damage can be  dodged and  blocked but it cannot be  missed.
 These attacks deal  proc damage.

 Grandmaster's Might's bonus resistances are calculated both on-cast and will update dynamically every 0.25s over the duration.
